Deploy anywhere, control everything. Trusted by governments, enterprises and militaries around the world. Talk to an Expert Try Mattermost Deployed by the world’s leading organizations In mission-critical environments, failure is not an option. Mattermost ensures adaptable, focused, resilient collaboration– keeping your teams connected when the mission is on the line. Built for real-world mission success Adaptable Integrate and extend your collaboration environment to fit the tools you need to achieve the mission, from custom apps to industry standards. Focused With deep integrations with mission-critical tools, integrated playbooks and native audio calling, Mattermost cuts through the noise to keep your team focused on the workflows that matter most. Secure When you secure your data, you secure your mission. Robust security and compliance features ensure your data stays controlled and secure at all times. Resilient When incidents happen, effective recovery is critical to mission success. Support for self-hosted, private cloud and high-availability deployments give you control even in highly sensitive environments. conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their workflows and improve collaboration. I came across Mattermost and was impressed with the work you're doing in secure operations. Can you tell me a bit about your current data processing challenges?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, yes. We do have some challenges with data processing, but we're currently using a solution from Splunk. It's been working okay for us so far. What makes DeepData AI different from what we're already using?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question. DeepData AI offers more advanced machine learning capabilities and better scalability than Splunk. We've seen our customers achieve significant cost savings and improved insights with our solution. I'd love to set up a demo to show you what we can do. Would you be open to that?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm not sure. We're in the middle of a big project right now and I don't know if we have the bandwidth to evaluate a new solution. Plus, we just renewed our contract with Splunk a few months ago, so I'm not sure if we're ready to make a change. What kind of pricing are we talking about?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing is competitive with Splunk, and we offer flexible plans to fit your needs. I can give you a customized quote if you're interested. But I want to assure you that our solution can integrate seamlessly with your existing workflows, including Mattermost. We've had success with similar integrations in the past.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate that, but like I said, we just renewed our contract with Splunk. We're locked in for at least another 18 months. I don't think we can consider switching to a new solution right now, regardless of the benefits. And to be honest, even if we could, I'm not sure if our team would be on board with learning a new system.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand the contract constraint, but I was hoping we could discuss potential ROI and how DeepData AI could help you achieve your goals in the long run. Maybe we could set up a call for next quarter to revisit the conversation?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alex, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. We're committed to our current contract and don't see a need to change at this time. Thank you for reaching out, but I think we'll stick with what we have.

analysis.raw:
Score: 2
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller should have more thoroughly qualified the buyer's current contract status and potential for change before investing time in the call. Sentiment: Neutral
